title: Hungary launches $157 million scheme to curb heating costs ahead of election
full_text: Hungary launches $157 million scheme to curb heating costs ahead of election. BUDAPEST, Jan 29 (Reuters) - Hungary's government will partly reimburse higher heating costs for households in January due to increased demand amid freezing ....
